main event: A satellite, identified as Echo II, passed over Provo, Utah on April 13, 1964.
interesting points: The sighting occurred at approximately 2010 hours in Provo, Utah., The witness requested identification of the observed object., ECHO 11 was scheduled to be over Provo at the time of the sighting., The report concludes there was insufficient data to evaluate the incident further., A letter from Major Maston M. Jacks confirmed the satellite sighting.
witness description: A person who reported seeing the satellite.
